title: Top 25 Most Offensive Cigar Names
itunes:title: Top 25 Most Offensive Cigar Names
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… In this “WOKE society” we live-in, people get offended by everything. Whatever happened to “Sticks & Stones will Break My Bones, but Names will Never Hurt Me”? Especially a Cigar Name! But today – we reveal the Top 25 Most Offensive Cigar Brands.

In the first hour we will light up a cigar from the Care Package it’s the HVC Black Friday 2021. While in the second hour we will light up something new to the shelf in EPC Short Run 2022.

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Ask the Don, the Email of the Week and a peek into the Asylum.

As always you can find many of the cigars we smoke at https://www.2guyscigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
